short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search BTS Flight Data to get aircraft registration info into Flight Memory/FlugStatistik

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your Flight Memory data more complete with this shortcut to look up aircraft registration details for flights operating within the USA. Loading a flight edit page will now automatically display the aircraft registration N-Number if it is a domestic US flight since 1995 with the DoT filing the data.

Just click the registration number and it will copy automagically into the correct field on FlightMemory to update your trip details!

v0.3.1 - Supports SSL
